title: Bug 4385QualifiedAllocationExpression.sourceEnd incorrect if type is an AnonymousLocalTypeDeclaration
description: Bug 4385QualifiedAllocationExpression.sourceEnd incorrect if type is an AnonymousLocalTypeDeclaration
SR: Consider the following source:Protectable p= new Protectable() {public void protect() throws Exception {setUp();basicRun(result);tearDown();}};SourceEnd of the QualifiedAllocationExpression new Protectable is the e ofProtectable and not the closing } of the type declaration
